txt.en: 'Ride, [placeholder]! I only pray that your steed can bear you swiftly enough. The folk of Langhold must flee while there is still time!'

'So... the brigands ally with the Easterlings, led by a captain of Mordor. This is dire news indeed. What do you propose, [placeholder]?'\n\nYou urge the Thane to evacuate Langhold. For a moment, he says nothing in reply; he only stares gravely into the distance.
The Thane of Langhold must be warned of the impending attack by the united forces of Mordor's Easterlings and the Wold's own brigands.
Urge Thane Utred to evacuate Langhold at once
Thane Utred can be found at the Mead Hall in Langhold.\n\nYou should return to Thane Utred with the urgent warning of Easterlings and the Nazg√ªl.
